org.xlattice.httpd

Class HttpSListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.httpd.HttpParser
      • org.xlattice.httpd.HttpSListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpSCallBacks, org.xlattice.overlay.CallBack, org.xlattice.overlay.GetCallBack, org.xlattice.transport.ConnectionListener

    public class HttpSListener
extends HttpParser
implements org.xlattice.transport.ConnectionListener, HttpSCallBacks
    Constructs an HTTP server connection listener. Each SchedulableConnection created by an HTTP SchedulableAcceptor will have one of these attached to it.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • dataSent

        public void dataSent()
        IOSchedule signalling back that message to client has been sent. In actual use, we get one dataSent() call for the header block, but SIX TO SEVEN dataSent() invocations for the entity.
        Specified by:

      • parseRequestLine

        protected HttpRequest parseRequestLine(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
                                throws MessageFormatException,
                                       NotImplementedException
        Given a ByteBuffer holding a client request, constructs a data structure populated with the results of a parse. The ByteBuffer should have been flipped. XXX The URI may have been %XX encoded (RFC 2396), needs to be XXX decoded here.
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException
        NotImplementedException
